sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access/>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SDLCRelationships</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Manage and query relationships between SDLC products, releases, and other task records.</description>
        <name>SDLCRelationships</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SDLCRelationships = Class.create();

SDLCRelationships.prototype = Object.extendsObject(RMv2Relationships, {
  initialize : function() {
  },

  // return URL of planning board to display, based upon current record and its parent
  //  type - product, release, release_phase
  //  record - relevant planned_task record
  //  bq   - base query (URL encoded)
  planningBoardURL: function(type, current, bq) {
     var formURL;
     var record = current;
     if (type == 'rm_product')
        formURL = 'cardboard_sdlc.do';
     else if (type == 'rm_release_sdlc') {
        formURL = 'cardboard_sdlc.do';
        record = current.parent;
     }
     else
        return;

     var baseId = record.sys_id;
     var shortD = record.short_description;
     var ci = record.cmdb_ci;
     var q = this.queryString(record);
     bq += this.fixedQueryString(record); // assumes bq is non empty String

     formURL += '?sysparm_query=' + q + '&sysparm_fixed_query=' + bq + '&sysparm_sys_id=' + baseId + '&sysparm_view=sdlc&sysparm_cmdb_ci=' + ci + '&sysparm_display_name=' + shortD;    
     return formURL; 
  },

  type: SDLCRelationships
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>james.grinter</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2010-12-21 12:44:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>08f5c36f0a0a2c391801405b57ddefac</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SDLCRelationships</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC)" source="com.snc.sdlc">7205e388477e0610cd4e1ce4316d43dc</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_08f5c36f0a0a2c391801405b57ddefac</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>james.grinter</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2011-01-10 12:18:48</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
